summary: "Inside Man" is a 2006 crime thriller by Spike Lee about a complex bank robbery on Wall Street. Denzel Washington plays a police hostage negotiator, Clive Owen is the heist's clever leader, and Jodie Foster helps keep a secret safe. The story took five years to develop and was the first original screenplay by Russell Gewirtz. Filming happened in New York City in 2005. The movie was a big success, making $184.4 million worldwide and is Spike Lee's highest-grossing film.
title: Inside Man
